mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspGodPrcLdadng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , CRNCY_VALID_CPHR , CRNCY_CD , RTL_PRC , CSMR_PRC , EMP_PRC , DC_PRC , APL_PRM_NO , DC_SECT_CD , PRM_DTL_TP_CD , LAST_SALE_PRC , CPN_PRM_NO , LAST_SALE_PRC_APL_CPN_PRM_NO , CPN_DC_SECT_CD , UDT_DT FROM DSP_GOD_PRC_LDADNG WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspGodPrcLdadng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_GOD_PRC_LDADNG WHERE 1 = 1
